DOC.detailed_description: Multicentric , Randomized phase III study ( 1:1 ) , Population : newly diagnose 1p/19-codeleted anaplastic glioma , Primary objective : To determine whether treat newly diagnose 1p/19q-codeleted anaplastic glioma PCV alone increase overall survival without neurocognitive deterioration Control group : radiotherapy follow 6 cycle PCV chemotherapy . Experimental group : 6 cycle PCV chemotherapy ( radiotherapy defer time progression ) . Number centre participate : 31 center POLA network Recruitment duration : 7 year , accrual rate 40 patient per year , patient followed-up end trial .
